ygData.subject: Re: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: No trick really just sound stratagey... 1) use 3 cheap items and one expensive item untill that arrow is trivial 2)buy as much Charisima raising stuff as your
ygData.messageBody:
No trick really just sound stratagey...

1) use 3 cheap items and one expensive item untill that arrow is trivial
2)buy as much Charisima raising stuff as your can find. even if you just
ware it while fletching.. get that charisima up up up ... so you can buy
cheaper and sell higher.
3) don't waste time selling arrows to public... make them and sell them back
to merchant.... and so on and so on ... yes it will cost lots of money ...
but at high master lvl you can finaly make cash at making darkwood bows and
TS bows.. but no one want to fail at darkwood belive me.
4) i have found a chart that tells the right combonation of stuff to walk
you all the way up to lvl158 or so by the cheapest route... man i wish i had
found it at the start .. and not a lvl 105 ... i would be a rich man if i
had.... Oh well.
5) i was told that surrfall prices are 20% cheaper than kelethin for
supplies...
then i was told it was a myth ... i don't know the source wants to
discourage people from fletching so i don't know how good his infomation is.

----- Original Message -----
From: Shane Sealy <buffsealy@...>
To: <EQ_Fletchers@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 22, 1999 11:25 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Fletchers] (no subject)


> From: "Shane Sealy" <buffsealy@...>
>
> What tricks do you speak of? I'm only lv 53, and i need some tricks, hehe,
> please tell me
>
> Lubin Pinekeeper, Wuss Fletcher
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Cooper, Mark <blackhawk@...>
> To: EQ_Fletchers@onelist.com <EQ_Fletchers@onelist.com>
> Date: Wednesday, July 21, 1999 3:02 PM
> Subject: Re: [EQ_Fletchers] (no subject)
>
>

one

> >lvl fast and thanks to the new tricks i have learn which you all probly
> >already know... i will be able to to that rather fast ... god i shudder
to
> >think of how much more pp i have spent that i did not need to ... well
live
> >and learn.
> >
> > good huting
> >karvar
> >----- Original Message -----

sell

> >> for 250pp :) 150pp for just holding an item for awhile. If you keep
> buying
> >him
> >> out, he'll have to constantly travel for materials and he'll never be
> able
> >to
> >> compete with you. Unfortunately, this'll only work if you have one hell
> of

> >> of plat saved up =P

> >> >
> >> > Well at lvl 105 i made TS bow.. on third attempt ... but have tried 3

> >> > times and falled. so i stand at one out of 6 at lvl 105 ... but i
have
> a
> >big
> >> > bone to pick..i want to know what is fair price to sell bow at.... i
> >sell to
> >> > my guild members at 100pp and 10 servos and 10 kolka nuts... but to
non
> >> > guild members i sell at 250pp ... but now i have anouther fletcher on

harassing
> >me
> >> > in a very polite way ( he was not rude) to lower my price.. he says
> this
> >> > will stop more peole form becoming fletchers... i fail to see his
> >> > logic...but his lvl is 190 and mine is 105 so he can pump them out
> >farter
> >> > that i can... but i have 80 pices of each item. so i can compete and
my
> >> > skill is gettting better .. but my charizma is 85 with buffs and his
> >starts
> >> > at 90 with out ... so this will be a challange.. my question is after
> >all
> >> > our blood sweat and tears to work our way to master fletchers and
> >haveing no
> >> > market to speak or to sell our wears ...what is a fair price for a
bow
> >that
> >> > is cheap to make for us but has a very limited market ... at 100 pp
> each
> >i
> >> > see this markert being staturated very very quick.. i can see 100p
and
> a
> >> > good item in trade or a item worth 200pp in trade ... i'm all for
> barter
> >...
> >> > but at 100pp per bow in gerneral auction ...seem to me to undermine
all
> >of
> >> > our hard work. please help what is a fair price for bow in open
market
> >> >
> >> > thanks
> >> > karvar
